mapper.select: /* 가맹점 목록 */ SELECT branch_code AS branchCode, member_id AS memberId, branch_name AS branchName FROM branch_management;

/* 특정 코드로 객실 조회*/ SELECT ri.branch_name, ri.room_name, ri.room_size, ri.room_basic_personnel, ri.room_max_personnel, ri.available_dog_types, ri.room_basic_price FROM room_information AS ri WHERE ri.room_code = #{roomCode};

SELECT ri.room_code, ri.branch_code, ri.registrant_id, ri.branch_name, ri.room_name, ri.room_size, ri.room_basic_personnel, ri.room_max_personnel, ri.available_dog_types, ri.room_basic_price, ri.room_registration_date FROM room_information AS ri;
